website_summaries.verdict: The best option from Sun Joe when mowing smaller or oddly shaped lawns where tight turns are needed.
pros: Three-wheel design allows the mower to pivot on a dime for navigating obstacles and tight turns
The mower can even cut around the base of trees and flowers
Offers four positions for cutting height
cons: Mower requires a long extension cord to cover most normal-sized yards adequately

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds expectations
customer_reviews.text: This mower exceeds my expectations. I wanted something to do touch up mowing at my townhouse. Perfect for that. It's light weight, folds up for an easy fit in the back of my station wagon for trips to my mom's for touch up mowing. The grass catcher bag is not large but adequate for small areas. Removal and replacing the bag quite easy. Love the three wheel design. It allows insertion into areas one must avoid with a traditional four wheeled machine. The cord requires some strategy and forethought, totally worth it to eliminate gas/oil and carburetors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Avoid At All Cost! Consider Yourself Warned!
customer_reviews.text: The worst thing I may have ever purchased. Difficult to put together, the tires are made of plastic, and it weighs too lite to perform. It felt like a toy out of the box. I regret not purchasing something with a rating, but let this be a warning to others. Somebody had to go first. This thing is basically a toy... that doesn't work properly. The height level would go from the highest level (a 4) and then automatically slide back to the ground lever (a 1). I returned it immediately . -2 Stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Phreak9mm

customer_reviews.title: Unstable
customer_reviews.text: The single front wheel sounded like a good idea being more manuverable but the wheel hangs up over and over. Sorry i purchased thisone and wish i could return it for a four wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Santa Fe Horses

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use. Even a senior female can use.
customer_reviews.text: As a female senior citizen I find this perfect for me for cutting my 900 square foot yard. Hangs on my garage wall out of the way when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Mary W

customer_reviews.title: works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: love this LITTLE mower. we have a larger yard that is not easily mowed. the three wheeled design and extreemly light weight make this a dream. Storage is simple as well , it folds down quick and easy. LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: C. Catalano

customer_reviews.title: Great and light
customer_reviews.text: I have the one with a battery, but like this one the best because it is so light
customer_reviews.author: Donnie Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent electric lawn mower
customer_reviews.text: I love it , it is quiet when ran . My only complaint is the bag capacity , otherwise it was a good purchase
customer_reviews.author: Nicki Lue

customer_reviews.title: Bag full indicator fell off/ broke and
customer_reviews.text: Works well but had a problem with the bag first ten minutes used. The small flag the indicates the bag is full fell off .
customer_reviews.author: Ramon Resto

customer_reviews.title: Great mower for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy using this mower even though you drag around the extension cord. Great for getting around grass that is above a garden an around trees using the single front wheel. My lawn is soft and bumpy with many dips. The front wheel seems to descend into the dips and cut too short. If your lawn is smooth with no dips this is a great mower for you. If your lawn is soft or has dips I would recommend the four wheel Sun Joe Electric Lawn Mower.
customer_reviews.author: cranem451

customer_reviews.title: ... am very satisfiled with this mover because it's very easy to deploy
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfiled with this mover because it's very easy to deploy,it can fit grass well in itself.Good for small area use. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: greg

customer_reviews.title: Assembly Required
customer_reviews.text: The Lawn mower was easy to assemble and it works well.
customer_reviews.author: DA-VERNE EVANS

customer_reviews.title: A bit too lite
customer_reviews.text: Mower is so light it’s, at times, difficult to keep in contact with the surface being mowed!
customer_reviews.author: BRAD STURTEVANT

customer_reviews.title: I would buy it again
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for baseball yard it's only 30 x 20 I can knock it out in no time at all with a 50 foot extension cord
customer_reviews.author: Karl Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, works well, easy to move around, light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Works.....amazing!
customer_reviews.text: It is lightweight ...half the weight of other brands. Cuts grass beautifully. I have St Augustine grass and it plows right through. I weigh 115 pounds so you can see how important the weight of the lawn mower is to me. It feels and looks like a toy but actually works! For a small yard this is perfect. I love Sun Joe products....they always exceed my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: susan osako

product_meta.title: Sun Joe MJ404E-360 16-Inch 12-Amp 360-Degree Turning Radius Electric Lawn Mower, Green
product_meta.description: Color:GreenDO MORE WITH LESS THAN 4! Mow with Joe and go with a trio of wheels for the closest cut yet! SUN JOE's single nose wheel provides maximum maneuverability, the tightest turning ratio, and unparalleled precision to easily pivot beneath hedges, and up close around trees or flower beds. The powerful 12 AMP electric motor ensures care-free continuous cutting, and the 16" wide cutting deck, 4-position adjustable cutting height, plus removable 9.25 gal collection bag allow you tailor your turf with unparalleled precision.
feature_bullets: Front wheel swivels 360 degrees for tight turns and close cuts around trees, flower beds and shrubs.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars29 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
